original_title: Bred And Breakfast: The Come Inn
overview: THE COME INN, Southern California’s one-of-a-kind bareback B&B, offers visitors loads of relaxation and bountiful spreads that give new meaning to “all you can eat.” Owned and operated by supersexy, long-term couple Josh Moore and Beau Butler, the cozy destination is the premier spot for guests who are hard to please — and pleased to be hard. Writer and Director Ben Rush teams up with Co-Director Pierce Paris to deliver steamy action featuring eight of the sexiest men in gay porn.
title: Bred And Breakfast: The Come Inn
